title: Poll Suggests Democrats Secretly Pine For A Pence Presidency
text:
Poll Suggests Democrats Secretly Pine For A Pence Presidency "... respect for our democratic institutions." by Jimmy Nguyen March 9, 2017 at 11:24am Advertisement - story continues below 
Are Democrats truly dreaming of a Mike Pence presidency? 
A poll conducted by PredictWise and commissioned by BuzzFeed News found 62 percent of Democrats surveyed said they would prefer a Pence administration to the Trump administration. 
The results certainly should not be interpreted to suggest Democrats are ready to stand behind Pence and champion his policies if he were to reach the Oval Office, however. Advertisement - story continues below Trump Confirms He Will Urge Senate To ‘Go Nuclear’ If Democrats Try To Stall Gorsuch Nomination 
Rather, it represents a movement among Democrats to end Trump’s administration early via impeachment or resignation. 
Former Obama speechwriter Jon Favreau told BuzzFeed his preference for Pence is based on one factor: the safety of the nation. 
“I’d sleep easier with almost any other human being as president than Donald Trump,” Favreau said. Advertisement - story continues below 
Chris Sacca, a liberal Silicon Valley investor said he would prefer Pence occupying the White House even though he doesn’t support his policies. 
“Pence’s policies would likely be just as bad as Trump’s when it comes to the impact on poor and working-class people and draconian toward women, people of color, and our LGBT Americans,” Sacca told BuzzFeed. “But at least Pence has respect for our democratic institutions. He has no business conflicts of interest, respects the press, doesn’t undermine our military and intelligence community leadership, doesn’t praise foreign dictators, and is not hell-bent on destroying government agencies that protect our country and the people here.” 
Readers commenting about the poll on BuzzFeed’s Facebook page echoed similar sentiments about Pence. Advertisement - story continues below
